casebody.data:
FERGUSON v. PROVIDENCE-WASHINGTON INS. CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals,' Second Circuit May 8, 1905.) No. 211. Appeal from the District Court of the'United States for the Southern District of New York. Le Roy S. Gove, for appellant. James Forrester, for appéjiee.

Before LACOMBE, TOWNSEND, and COXE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with interest and costs, on opinion of the ' District Judge. 125 Fed. 141.
